title: Family finance: Why Nair's financial goals will need to be staggered - Economic Times
content: Family finance: Why Nair's financial goals will need to be staggered  Economic Times
description: Nair first build an emergency corpus of Rs 2.52 lakh, which is equal to his six months' expenses. For this, he can allocate his cash of Rs 30,000 and will have to save his surplus of Rs 15,000 every month till the contingency corpus is built.
